010package imagingbook.common.sift.scalespace;
011
012/**
013 * <p>
014 * Represents a hierarchical DoG scale space. See Sec. 25.1.4 of [1] for more
015 * details.
016 * </p>
017 * <p>
018 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
019 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
020 * </p>
021 * 
022 * @author WB
023 * @version 2022/11/20
024 */
025public class DogScaleSpace extends HierarchicalScaleSpace<DogOctave> {
026        
027        /**
028         * Constructor, creates a {@link DogScaleSpace} from an existing
029         * {@link GaussianScaleSpace}.
030         * 
031         * @param G a {@link GaussianScaleSpace}
032         */
033        public DogScaleSpace(GaussianScaleSpace G) {
034                super(G.P, G.Q, G.sigma_s, G.sigma_0, G.botLevel, G.topLevel-1);  //botLevel = -1, topLevel = K+1
035                build(G);
036        }       
037        
038        private void build(GaussianScaleSpace G) {
039                // build DoG octaves:
040                for (int p = 0; p < G.P; p++) {
041                        GaussianOctave Gp = G.getOctave(p);
042                        setOctave(p, new DogOctave(Gp));
043                }
044        }
045
046}
